note:
This is my professional self, so almost all posts will be about what is important to me at work.

My current role is Chief Product and Technology Officer at Steadybit, where I hopefully help people create value with software and enjoy their job.

Expect content about software engineering, product & engineering management, startup life, distributed teams, and random stuff that sparks my interest.

He/Him
